import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { greetings } from "../portfolio"; import code from '../assets/lottie/coding.json'; import Pdf from '../documents/resume.pdf'; import { Fade } from 'react-reveal'; import { Button, Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import GreetingLottie from "../components/DisplayLottie"; import SocialLinks from "components/SocialLinks"; const Greetings = () => { useEffect(() => { document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0; document.scrollingElement.scrollTop = 0; }) return (

{greetings.title + " "}

{greetings.description}
{/* SVG separator */}
{/* 1st Hero Variation */}
); } export default Greetings;
